channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for HI
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for HI

item.title: Report I-2024050083
item.description:
Report I-2024050083

Identified by scraper @ 2024-05-30T18:16:39+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-04-27
  • City: Honolulu
  • State: HI
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Air
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED AIRLINES HOLDINGS, INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: Passenger seated in 2A dropped phone in the lie flat seat Passenger then reclined seat which caused the device to be damaged LED screen was cracked and mobile device itself seemed to be bulging Owner of said device did not want to be responsible for device should it have caught fire As a precaution FA crew determined it necessary to place bag in TCB
